title: Agbe
author: Agbe
content: The Pharmacist has been asking our boss (theymos) to change his name to The Sceptical Chymist and today I discovered that the username has finally been changed. My brother from another country The Sceptical Chymist congratulations. I believed the additional merit allocation request also also granted. theymos thank you very much for granting him the request. Nigerian Board is also on the request Queue...we also appeal to him for the creation of the board

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Yep, he just realized it here[1] lol. For those who asked about the former The Sceptical Chymist, he is now @fbeyvgnobo, what a username made by theymos lol. Here's his post on the request thread[2], with the quotes confirming his former username.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5426440.msg61414870#msg61414870[2] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5312089.msg61247685#msg61247685

comments.author: Shamm
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on December 09, 2022, 07:39:02 AMThe Pharmacist has been asking our boss (theymos) to change his name to The Sceptical Chymist and today I discovered that the username has finally been changed. My brother from another country The Sceptical Chymist congratulations. I believed the additional merit allocation request was also granted. theymos thank you very much for granting him the request. Nigerian Board is also on the request Queue...we also appeal to him for the creation of the board (OLD) The Pharmacist (NEW) The Sceptical Chymist congratulations on the new name, Theymos Nailed it. And also he deserves this because of his work and contribution then his name is very popular here in the community for fighting scammboosters and for spammers in our community. Also, this is not the first time theymos responded to this kind of request because some users requested and then theymos Nailed it. It

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on December 09, 2022, 07:39:02 AMThe Pharmacist has been asking our boss (theymos) to change his name to The Sceptical Chymist and today I discovered that the username has finally been changed. My brother from another country The Sceptical Chymist congratulations. I believed the additional merit allocation request also also granted. theymos thank you very much for granting him the request. Nigerian Board is also on the request Queue...we also appeal to him for the creation of the boardCongratulations to The Sceptical Chymist!  it took a long time for his wish to be granted. This is a lesson for everyone, specifically me, that we shouldn't lose hope about our requests, goals, or aspirations. That's why we need virtues called patience and persistence. As I earlier stated in this thread, Public request to Theymos for a name change, he deserves this name because it suits his personality. A big thank you to Theymos and others that have supported the course of this change of name. I also hope that all our desires would one day come to reality.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on December 09, 2022, 07:39:02 AMThe Pharmacist has been asking our boss (theymos) to change his name to The Sceptical Chymist and today I discovered that the username has finally been changed.LOL! Thanks for bringing this up, I would be missing the news for some more time, maybe even days.What a nice present! Funny enough, I even told him that he may get the name change granted as Christmas present. Who said that theymos cannot be kind? Just give the man some time! Congrats The Sceptical Chymist!

comments.author: dbc23
comments.body: Sometimes its is good to give time a chance. Congratulations Sceptical Chymist this really Christmas present just like @NeuroticFish responded. The additional merit allocation will also be granted seen how contributive Sceptical Chymist has been to the growth of the forum. As for the Nigerian Board we believe theymos is seriously making plans to seeing he allocate a board to Nigerians. Every good thing takes time. It been long since  Sceptical Chymist made the appeal and here his first request is been granted awaiting the second. So we too we wait till it gets to our turn I strongly believe thymos has Nigerians at heart.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Congratulations on your request granted by Theymos to change your user name to Skeptical Chymist. You have added impact on the lives of forum users, and its great to have someone like you,sacrificing your time and effort to make sure there is growth in the forum.Life is all about patient in other to enable man achieve his goal or dreams,all we need to do is to be hardworking and care about other people,as time goes our dreams will come true. I know Theymos will also grant Skeptical Chymist his next request of merit increase soon, Thymos is waiting for the right time to do that. May your new user name bring goodluck,blessing and favour to you sir. I admire your tiredless effort in the forum.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Congratulations 'The Sceptical Chymist' for request granted by Theymos. Honestly i know how happy you are seeing that what one requested was given to him despite all every that was pending on queue.Just as OP already said i wish our dreams would come through someday by granting our request as well for Nigerian local Board.Do you mind hosting a party @ 'The Sceptical Chymist'

comments.author: Lafu
comments.body: Oh wow " Congratulations to the Name change " The Sceptical Chymist , finaly after a long time asking and waiting for !Now i have to remember this change and guess it will takes some time to get it .I remember it was the same thing with when TheBeardedBaby got his name change , sometimes its hard then to recognize them with their new names.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: I think he really deserved it, i have know him to be a good active user on the forum regardless of time and energy. My boss The Sceptical Chymist i say a very big congratulation to you for name changed successfully, your impact on this Forum can never be devalued most especially helping newbies and members to rank up with your merits rewards which I m also a partaker and a beneficiary of it.How i wish you are from my country I would congratulated you in our African way Nigeria precisely.Thank you for the lift you have given to us sir.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: RIP @The Pharmacist - We will miss you.  Congratulations to @TSC! It will take some time to get used to this change, but I'm sure "The Pharmacist" will remain a part of our memory in some way, shape or form. @ibminer & @suchmoon, I think the BPIP database needs some manual editing.https://bpip.org/Report?r=dt2strength

comments.author: Igebotz
comments.body: Quote from: NeuroticFish on December 09, 2022, 09:16:51 AMQuote from: Agbe on December 09, 2022, 07:39:02 AMThe Pharmacist has been asking our boss (theymos) to change his name to The Sceptical Chymist and today I discovered that the username has finally been changed.LOL! Thanks for bringing this up, I would be missing the news for some more time, maybe even days.What a nice present! Funny enough, I even told him that he may get the name change granted as Christmas present. Who said that theymos cannot be kind? Just give the man some time! Congrats The Sceptical Chymist!Theymos works in mysterious ways, striking you when you least expect it, and his silence speaks volumes, which is the one thing I've learned about him... If he is going to give you something, he is going to make sure you deserve it. I'm just curious what happened to the other newbie account that registered with "The Sceptical Chymist"? Was he nuked because that's the only way Theymos could achieve something like this. ? .. I knew the idiot was nothing more than a troll.Is the "The Pharmacist" vacant now?

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Congratulations to The Skeptical Chymist. The request has lasted almost forever and it's great that theymos still considered and implemented the change.Quote from: igehhh on December 09, 2022, 12:12:07 PMI'm just curious what happened to the other newbie account that registered with "The Sceptical Chymist"? Was he nuked because that's the only way Theymos could achieve something like this. ? .. I knew the idiot was nothing more than a troll.It was mentioned much earlier in the thread, that theymos had changed the users display name to something totally random. Check the reply and the quoted ones;Quote from: PX-Z on December 09, 2022, 07:47:06 AM[2] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5312089.msg61247685#msg61247685

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: The Sceptical ChymistCongratulations on the name from the pharmacist to your desired name. The long wait was worth it and also a big thank you to the father of the forum for adhering to this request and for everyone that has supported this motion. Well for your request of the additional smerit i pray also that theymos will grant you that because your aspiration in seeing that members of the forum who are working should grow is really something special and we the members of the forum are looking forward to your continuous hardwork and time you have been taking to help give the credit that is deserved to whom deem fit. The way theymos operate no one can truly understand it and all what is holding this second request is just time maybe theymos feels the right time is not now. Once again thank you sir for the name change and congratulations on your request granted

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on December 09, 2022, 07:39:02 AMThe Pharmacist has been asking our boss (theymos) to change his name to The Sceptical Chymist and today I discovered that the username has finally been changed. My brother from another country The Sceptical Chymist congratulations. Thank you, and thanks to everyone who's PMed me with congratulations.  I have to admit it's weird seeing a different username on my profile, but I'll get used to it and am grateful to Theymos for granting me my wish.  Somebody helped me out with it by notifying Theymos today or yesterday, and they did this on their own.  Don't know if it was Halab or PowerGlove or anyone else, but whoever was lobbying on my behalf I'd like to thank you sincerely.Quote from: Agbe on December 09, 2022, 07:39:02 AMI believed the additional merit allocation request also also granted. theymos thank you very much for granting him the request. No.  That one was rejected out of hand, and I accept it.Quote from: PX-Z on December 09, 2022, 07:47:06 AMFor those who asked about the former The Sceptical Chymist, he is now @fbeyvgnobo, what a username made by theymos lol.Big Effin' LOL.  That's what you get, stealer of dreams!Quote from: Zlantann on December 09, 2022, 09:03:44 AMThis is a lesson for everyone, specifically me, that we shouldn't lose hope about our requests, goals, or aspirations. That's why we need virtues called patience and persistence. That's the thing--I wasn't persistent at all, and Theymos told me as much in the PM he sent me.  I should have been sending him periodic reminders instead of what I actually did, which was nothing.  It worked out in the end in spite of me and my idiocy.Quote from: dbc23 on December 09, 2022, 09:37:28 AMAs for the Nigerian Board we believe theymos is seriously making plans to seeing he allocate a board to Nigerians. I hope you get one, and take heed of what I wrote above; he says (and I'm paraphrasing here) that he tends to forget about requests if he isn't reminded of them, so be persistent....and obviously patient, too.Y'all rock!!

comments.author: PowerGlove
comments.body: TP after logging in and seeing his new name:Congrats, man. You deserve it!

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on December 09, 2022, 07:39:02 AMNigerian Board is also on the request Queue...we also appeal to him for the creation of the boardI wish it happens along with Bengali board too. We have been looking for that quite a long but no response from theymos. I'm sure that we can get lots of quality posters and could attract more users on the forum. Right now, no one gets a proper guideline in Bengali thread.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: PowerGlove on December 09, 2022, 12:30:32 PMTP after logging in and seeing his new name:<snip>It was even weirder than that, because the change happened while I was in the middle of a discussion with Halab about my monthly sMerit allocation:Quote from: The Sceptical Chymist on December 08, 2022, 11:26:40 PMDid I just get my name change granted???  I almost jizzed my knickers!  Thank you, Theymos!!<snip>And your support is not lost on me, buddy.  I appreciate you keeping my request alive even while I was being a slovenly sloth and just bitching about my sad lot in life instead of advocating for myself by PMing Theymos directly and repeatedly.  Live and learn.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Although it was not me, but I'm really happy to see @The Pharmacist can change his name become @The Sceptical Cymist after long time awaiting for theymos to realize that. Maybe someone that want to change his name should create proposal and wrote "Fuck you" to theymos, it might trigger him Congratulations for the new name @The Sceptical Chymist, the way how you become a good merit sources to read every posts from many members (including me) that asking for you to review, you got a respect by many users. I hope you will always healthy and happy life, you're one of big asset on this forum.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: Great after a long time finally the change has been made and was surprised to see the thread in Meta board otherwise it would have taken me more time time to realise that change has finally be implemented and our known @Pharmacist is now the one with username @The Sceptical Cymist so once again congratulations to you man and you deserve it.Hope you enjoying this gift from @theymos at an unexpected time when you have some other requests on the verge also but that's completely fine as your one wish is granted by him.
